lead_paragraph: McLaren's Fernando Alonso will use a spare chassis and new power unit to compete in Sunday's Bahrain Grand Prix, after a crash in Formula One's Australian season-opener wrecked his car.

headline.print_headline: New Power Unit to Get Alonso Back on Track in Bahrain
headline.main: New Power Unit to Get Alonso Back on Track in Bahrain

snippet: McLaren's Fernando Alonso will use a spare chassis and new power unit to compete in Sunday's Bahrain Grand Prix, after a crash in Formula One's Australian season-opener wrecked his car....
